virtual void MsgHandler::message ( int  level,
const std::string &  msg,
bool  delimiter = true 
) [pure virtual]

A message to be processed by the handler.

Parameters:
level - What level of verbosity is associated with this message, higher number == more verbosity.
msg - Message that is to be processed.
delimiter - Should a delimiter be emitted as well?

Implemented in MsgStream.

void MsgHandler::setBaseVerbosity ( int  level  )  [inline]

What level of verbosity is requested.

This is a hint to the class and can be ignored if desired.

Parameters:
level - Level below which progress messages are printed.
